Sql.query: insert into trn_ing_retirosc ( ingrsccodi, pericodi, emprcodi, ingrscversion, ingrscimporte, ingrscimportevtp, ingrscusername, ingrscfecins, ingrscfecact ) values ( :ingrsccodi, :pericodi, :emprcodi, :ingrscversion, :ingrscimporte, :ingrscimportevtp, :ingrscusername, :ingrscfecins, :ingrscfecact )
delete from trn_ing_retirosc where pericodi = :pericodi and ingrscversion = :ingrscversion

select trn_ing_retirosc.*, (select sum(ingrscimporte) from trn_ing_retirosc where pericodi = :pericodi and ingrscversion = :ingrscversion ) as Total from trn_ing_retirosc where pericodi = :pericodi and ingrscversion= :ingrscversion

select trn_ing_retirosc.*, (select emprnomb from vw_si_empresa where emprcodi=trn_ing_retirosc.emprcodi) as nombEmpresa, (select perinombre from trn_periodo where pericodi=trn_ing_retirosc.pericodi) as nombPeriodo from trn_ing_retirosc where (pericodi =:pericodi or :pericodi is null) and (ingrscversion =:ingrscversion or :ingrscversion is null)
select * from trn_ing_retirosc where pericodi = :pericodi and ingrscversion = :ingrscversion
select * from trn_ing_retirosc where pericodi = :pericodi and ingrscversion = :ingrscversion and emprcodi = :emprcodi
